column2: BRIEF-Sealed Air Says CEO Edward Doheny's FY 2019 Total Compensation Was $8.97 Million April 9 (Reuters) - Sealed Air Corp: * SEALED AIR CORP SAYS CEO EDWARD DOHENYâ€™S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $8.97 MILLION VERSUS $8.93 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * SEALED AIR CORP SAYS FOR 2019, CEO PAY RATION WAS 161 TO 1 Source text: (bit.ly/2JQpSMj) Further company coverage:
